original_text: We must continue to do things that are good and we should not get tired. If we do not feel weak and stop doing good things, then we will receive a good harvest at the proper time.
korean_text: 우리가 선을 행하되 낙심하지 말지니 포기하지 아니하면 때가 이르매 거두리라

sentences.original_text: We must continue to do things that are good
and we should not get tired
If we do not feel weak and stop doing good things
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 우리가 약해지지 않고 선한 일을 멈추지 않으면

sentences.original_text: then we will receive a good harvest at the proper time
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리는 적절한 때에 좋은 수확을 거두게 될 것입니다
